oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Overton Park Pavilion and Lake with High Fountain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Pavilion and Lake, Overton Park, Memphis, Tenn." Color image with high spray from fountain.

"Mrs. Maria S. Ellis -- 739 Madison St. -- Clarksville -- Tenn. -- Dear Mrs. Ellis, -- Did you reach home safely? -- We had a most delightful time in -- Chatt. We three girls went together, -- did not care to stay with the other -- bunch. Did you find a bracelet -- in your room? The night I came -- in (Fri.) I took off my jewelery (?) some -- in your room and some in mine. -- Well, anyway I got to the train and my -- bracelet was not on my arm so thought -- I left it in the room. Have not found it -- among my things. -- Barbara Leronin -- 1133 E. Moreland."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Overton Park; parks; lakes;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: C. T. Photochrom; Collection processed by Angela Price
